SEARCH
Package service

Interface CompanyRepresentativeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompanyRepresentativeServiceImpl
public interface CompanyRepresentativeService
Service interface for company representative operations. Handles internship opportunity creation and application management.
Since:
2025-10-07
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 SCED Group-6

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • createOpportunity

      InternshipOpportunity createOpportunity(CompanyRepresentative rep, InternshipOpportunity opportunity)
      Creates a new internship opportunity. Validates business rules: - Representative is approved - Maximum 5 opportunities per representative - Valid opportunity data
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative creating the opportunity
      opportunity - The internship opportunity to create
      Returns:
      The created InternshipOpportunity object
      Throws:
      BusinessRuleException - if business rules are violated
      UnauthorizedException - if representative not approved

    • viewApplicationsForOpportunity

      List<ApplicationWithStudentDTO> viewApplicationsForOpportunity(CompanyRepresentative rep, String opportunityId)
      Views all applications for a specific internship opportunity with student details. Only accessible by the representative who created the opportunity.
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative
      opportunityId - The ID of the internship opportunity
      Returns:
      List of applications with student details for the opportunity
      Throws:
      UnauthorizedException - if representative doesn't own the opportunity
      ResourceNotFoundException - if opportunity not found

    • handleApplicationDecision

      void handleApplicationDecision(CompanyRepresentative rep, String applicationId, boolean approve)
      Approves or rejects a student application. Validates: - Application exists and is for rep's opportunity - Application is in PENDING status - Opportunity has available slots (for approval)
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative making the decision
      applicationId - The ID of the application
      approve - true to approve, false to reject
      Throws:
      BusinessRuleException - if rules are violated
      UnauthorizedException - if representative doesn't own the opportunity
      ResourceNotFoundException - if application not found

    • toggleVisibility

      void toggleVisibility(CompanyRepresentative rep, String opportunityId, boolean visibility)
      Toggles visibility of an internship opportunity. Only approved opportunities can have visibility toggled.
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative
      opportunityId - The ID of the internship opportunity
      visibility - The new visibility setting
      Throws:
      BusinessRuleException - if opportunity not approved
      UnauthorizedException - if representative doesn't own the opportunity
      ResourceNotFoundException - if opportunity not found

    • viewMyOpportunities

      List<InternshipOpportunity> viewMyOpportunities(CompanyRepresentative rep)
      Views all internship opportunities created by a representative.
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative
      Returns:
      List of the representative's internship opportunities

    • updateOpportunity

      void updateOpportunity(CompanyRepresentative rep, InternshipOpportunity opportunity)
      Updates an existing internship opportunity. Can only update opportunities that are PENDING or REJECTED. Rejected opportunities will be reset to PENDING status when edited and resubmitted. Approved opportunities cannot be edited.
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative
      opportunity - The updated internship opportunity
      Throws:
      BusinessRuleException - if opportunity already approved
      UnauthorizedException - if representative doesn't own the opportunity
      ResourceNotFoundException - if opportunity not found

    • deleteOpportunity

      void deleteOpportunity(CompanyRepresentative rep, String opportunityId)
      Deletes an internship opportunity. Can only delete opportunities that are PENDING or REJECTED. Approved opportunities cannot be deleted.
      Parameters:
      rep - The company representative
      opportunityId - The ID of the internship opportunity to delete
      Throws:
      BusinessRuleException - if opportunity already approved
      UnauthorizedException - if representative doesn't own the opportunity
      ResourceNotFoundException - if opportunity not found
